original_title: 引っ越し先の向かい窓　8頭身美脚人妻の誘惑ポージングに年下男はガマンなんて出来ません
overview: A young man who graduated from university and came to Tokyo to find a job, lived in a house across the street from a celebrity couple. Married Marin is a former model and has excellent style. Young people are fascinated by her appearance that can sometimes be seen from her window, and her worldly desires cannot be suppressed by her pose of eight heads and beautiful legs. One day she is suddenly invited to her house by her Marin to talk to her. But that was just an excuse for her to seduce him... I'm glad I moved here because I was able to have adulterous sex with my 171cm tall, small-faced wife!
title: Younger Man Unable to Resist Tempting Posing of 8-Headed Beautiful-Legged Married Woman in Far Window After Moving Home! Marin Hinata
